column-insert.label: Column before
column-insert.description: Insert a new table column before selected column

column-after-insert.label: Column after
column-after-insert.description: Insert a new table column after selected column

convert-to-row.label: Convert header row to row
convert-to-row.description: Convert the current selected header row into a row.

convert-to-header.label: Convert row to header row
convert-to-header.description: Convert the current selected row into a header row.

convert-firstrow-to-header.label: Convert first row to header row
convert-firstrow-to-header.description: Convert the first row into a header row.

convert-firsttworows-to-header.label: Convert first two rows to header rows
convert-firsttworows-to-header.description: Convert the first two rows into a header rows.

convert-firstthreerows-to-header.label: Convert first three rows to header rows
convert-firstthreerows-to-header.description: Convert the first three rows into a header rows.

row-insert.label: Row before
row-insert.description: Insert a new table row before selected row

row-after-insert.label: Row after
row-after-insert.description: Insert a new table row after selected row

split-cell-completely.label: Split cell completely
split-cell-completely.description: Split the cell to 1 by 1 cells

split-cell-into-rows.label: Split cell into rows
split-cell-into-rows.description: Split the cell's rowspan in half

split-cell-into-columns.label: Split cell into columns
split-cell-into-columns.description: Split the cell's columnsspan in half

merge-cell-right.label: Merge cell with cell to the right
merge-cell-right.description: Merge cell with the cell(s) to the right

merge-cell-left.label: Merge cell with cell to the left
merge-cell-left.description: Merge cell with the cell(s) to the left

merge-cell-above.label: Merge cell with cell above
merge-cell-above.description: Merge cell with the cell(s) above

merge-cell-below.label: Merge cell with cell below
merge-cell-below.description: Merge cell with the cell(s) below

set-table-styling.label: With borders, with heading
set-table-styling.description: With borders, with heading style for selected table.

set-table-styling-borderless-headerless.label: Without borders, without heading
set-table-styling-borderless-headerless.description: Without borders, without heading style for selected table.

set-table-styling-borderless.label: Without borders, with heading
set-table-styling-borderless.description: Without borders, with heading style for selected table.

set-table-styling-headerless.label: With borders, without heading
set-table-styling-headerless.description: With borders, without heading style for selected table.

set-cell-horizontal-alignment-left.label: Left
set-cell-horizontal-alignment-left.description: Align the cells content to the left.

set-cell-horizontal-alignment-right.label: Right
set-cell-horizontal-alignment-right.description: Align the cells content to the right.

set-cell-horizontal-alignment-center.label: Center
set-cell-horizontal-alignment-center.description: Align the cells content to the center.

set-cell-horizontal-alignment-justify.label: Justify
set-cell-horizontal-alignment-justify.description: Align the cells content to the left and right.

set-cell-vertical-alignment-top.label: Top
set-cell-vertical-alignment-top.description: Align the cells content to the top.

set-cell-vertical-alignment-bottom.label: Bottom
set-cell-vertical-alignment-bottom.description: Align the cells content to the bottom.

set-cell-vertical-alignment-center.label: Center
set-cell-vertical-alignment-center.description: Align the cells content to the center.
